body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Hugh Ferguson. Merchant in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned four enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Resident of Louisville in 1860. Flour merchant in partnership with Hugh Ferguson in Ferguson & Son in Louisville in 1861. Flour inspector in Louisville in 1865.
